metro.TrainManagement.Lines

Class RailwayConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.TrainManagement.Lines.RailwayConnection

  • public class RailwayConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    A RailwayConnection is the connection between two railway nodes. This connection is used by train lines to move trains. All connections have a color.
    Author:
    hauke

    • Constructor Detail

      • RailwayConnection

        public RailwayConnection(RailwayNode node1,
                 RailwayNode node2)
        Creates a new connection of two railway nodes. The order (with regard to the equals-method) of the nodes is irrelevant!
        Parameters:
        node1 - The first node.
        node2 - The second node.

      • getColorIndex

        private int getColorIndex(java.awt.Color color)
        Gets the HSV/HSB value of the RGP color as integer. This is a unique index of this color.
        Parameters:
        color - The color which index you want to have.
        Returns:
        An unique index of this color.
